meanings: quality (of a product or a service)

lessons.japanese: 貴社の品質管理のやり方には感心しました。
lessons.english: I'm very impressed with your quality control.

lessons.japanese: もっと品質の良いものはありますか。
lessons.english: Do you have better quality ones?

lessons.japanese: ぼくはこっちの方がそっちより品質が劣っていると思う。
lessons.english: I think this one is inferior to that in quality.

lessons.japanese: それは品質がよく、しかも安い。
lessons.english: It is both good and cheap.

lessons.japanese: それは値段は安いが、その反面品質がよくない。
lessons.english: It is cheap, but on the other hand it is not good.

lessons.japanese: その会社は高品質の製品で知られている。
lessons.english: The firm is known for its high-quality products.

lessons.japanese: そこのブロッコリーは高価であるか品質が悪いかのどちらかだ。
lessons.english: The broccoli is either costly or of poor quality.

lessons.japanese: これらの製品は同じ品質です。
lessons.english: These products are of the same quality.

lessons.japanese: こちらの製品は同じ品質になります。
lessons.english: These products are of the same quality.

lessons.japanese: これらの手作りの品は品質が違っている。
lessons.english: These hand-made articles differ in quality.

lessons.japanese: この服は品質においてあの服よりも優れていると思う。
lessons.english: I think this suit is vastly superior to that one in quality.

lessons.japanese: この服は品質においてあの服よりもずっと優れていると思う。
lessons.english: I think this suit is much superior to that one in quality.

lessons.japanese: この布は値段の割に品質が良い。
lessons.english: This cloth is good in quality for its price.
